{{doomwiki}}[[Image:Shot04.png|right|thumb|230px|A screenshot of ''Action Doom 2'' in the city, showing off its unique art style.]] {{Wad | name = Action Doom 2: Urban Brawl | author = Scuba Steve | iwad = Stand-alone | status = Released | type = m | caco = 15 | link = [http://action.mancubus.net/ad2free.htm Download from the official website] }} == About == ''Action Doom 2: Urban Brawl'' is the prequel to [[Action Doom]]. This time the gameplay has changed to a more melee combat-oriented style of play. It has many classic beat-'em-up style features such as enemy name and health bars. ''Action Doom 2'' has a unique cartoon art style. Rather than focusing on being a Doom modification, ''Action Doom 2'' is more of a stand alone game with completely original resources.
Bonus content is available on the official website, featuring several minigames presented as episodes.
''Action Doom 2'' received one of the 15th Annual [[Cacoward]]s.
